word: H3632 - כָּלִיל - kâlîyl - kaw-leel' - All - எல்லாம்

sections.paragraph: கட்டோடே, முழுவதுமான, முற்றிலுமான, சர்வாங்கமான, பூரண, குறைவற்ற - பெயரடை
entire, all, perfect, whole, whole burnt offering, holocaust, entirety

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H3634; complete; as noun, the whole (specifically a sacrifice entirely consumed); as adverb fully: - all, every whit, flame, perfect (-ion), utterly, whole burnt offering (sacrifice), wholly.
Cognate: H3605, H3632, H3634, H4358, H4359, H4360
